RainbruRPG::Core::Version

RainbruRPG::Core::Version Class Reference

#include <version.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Draw a little message telling the version of the program and the libraries it is linked with or it uses at runtime.

It also prints a GNU message.

Since the build 107, The package name, version and build number are taken from the config.h file.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RainbruRPG::Core::Version::Version (  ) 

The default constructor.

It set appName to its default value (RainbruRPG) and calls initVersion(). The value returned by this call is set to initOk.

Definition at line 32 of file version.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Core::Version::logVersion (  ) 

The log method.

By a call to this method, you ask this class to compute the version text and send it to the logger.

it uses std::ostringstream to perform the computation of version numbers and strings, then it calls Logger::logMessage().

Definition at line 53 of file version.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Core::Version::setApplicationName ( const char *  name  ) 

Change the application's name.

It simply change the appName value.

Parameters:
name The new name of the application.

Definition at line 96 of file version.cpp.

Member Data Documentation

const char* RainbruRPG::Core::Version::appName [private]

The name of the application.

This class is used by several applications (client, server...) so it is possible to change the application name. Use setApplicationName(const char*) to override it. The default is taken from the config.h header.

Definition at line 68 of file version.h.

const char* RainbruRPG::Core::Version::version [private]

The version comming from config.h.

If we consider w.x.y-z, the version is w.x.y.

Definition at line 75 of file version.h.

const char* RainbruRPG::Core::Version::build [private]

The build version of the application comming from config.h.

If we consider w.x.y-z, the build version number is z.
